body:
Comment 2 by **newton688**: 
From my experience the gdb project doesn't seem to care too much about external
contributions.

I have raised two gdb bugs for problems related to debugging with Go and gdb/MI:
https://sourceware.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15924
https://sourceware.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15729

The first even has a proposed patch. There has been literally no activity on these since
I raised them 6 months ago. I attempted to contact them via IRC and there has been no
response. I suppose I could try hitting their mailing list.

I have had better success with lldb. At least they commented on my bug.
http://llvm.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=17189
